ygData.subject: Death, Destruction...Soon
ygData.msgSnippet: Firestrike awoke, slowly pulling light through his optics. Adjustments, perfect, Vision 100%.  The bot raised it s torso, then flexed his arms.  Excellent

Subject: Death, Destruction...Soon

Firestrike awoke, slowly pulling light through his
optics.  
Adjustments, perfect, Vision 100%.  The bot raised
it's torso, then 
flexed his arms.  "Excellent"  voice thought inside
him.  "You will 
be silent," another said "I hold control ove this body
now, not you 
Blade." There was no reply. 

"SwitchBlade" he said as the bot stood and towered
over him.  
"Firestrike, for duty"
